mmActionModal

restrict: "E"

NameTypeDesciption
mm-action-modal Element Enables the Action Model Directive
selecteditem ngModel 2 way object
create-template child element <div class="create-template"></div>
edit-template child element <div class="edit-template"></div>
detail-template child element <div class="detail-template"></div>
delete-template child element <div class="delete-template"></div>
saveClicked function
detailClicked function
createClicked function
deleteClicked function
calldetail object | true/false calldetail=true to call delete
calledit object | true/false calledit=true to call delete
callcreate object | true/false callcreate=true to call delete
calldelete object | true/false calldelete=true to call delete
ng-non-bindable some directive will be transform before transclude happens and Directive get the modified html specially if there are some ng-repeat directive can't get it right
use ng-non-bindable to prevent those changes
{{selecteditem.name}} {{selecteditem.surName}}
{{cat}}
{{item.subcats}}
{{cat.name}}
{{cat.name}}

Are you sure want to delete {{item.name}} {{item.surName}} ?

 
<mm-action-modal selecteditem="selecteditem" calldetail="calldetail" detail-clicked="detailClicked" callcreate="callcreate" create-clicked="createClicked" calledit="calledit" save-clicked="saveClicked" calldelete="calldelete" delete-clicked="deleteClicked">
    <div class="create-template" ng-non-bindable >
        <form role="form">
            <div class="form-group">
                      <label>Surname</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.surName" placeholder="Surname">
                  </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Name</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.name" placeholder="Name">
            </div>
        </form>
    </div> 
    <div class="edit-template" ng-non-bindable >
        <form role="form">
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Surname</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.surName" placeholder="ID">
            </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Name</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.name" placeholder="Name">
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
     <div class="detail-template" ng-non-bindable >
        <form role="form">
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Surname</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.surName" placeholder="ID" disabled="">
            </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <label>Name</label><input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="item.name" placeholder="Name" disabled="">
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
    <div class="delete-template" ng-non-bindable >
        <br />
        <h4 class="text-center">Are you sure want to delete {{item.name}} {{item.surName}} ?</h4>
    </div>
</mm-action-modal>
